Title: Black Mirror
Writer: Peichen Wang, Nan Wu, Bin Xu, Pan Yang (story)
Actors: Chen Lu, Bo Feng, Yemang Zhou, Jianfeng Han
Plot: Xinling Zheng was a care free rich girl until her mother was taken away from her by a car accident. Xinling was taken to treatment center for her depression. Strange things started to happen in the treatment center.
